Zhen Li (李震) is currently a 2nd year Ph.D. candidate at Nankai University, supervised by Prof. Ming-Ming Cheng. His research interests include computer vision and deep learning, particularly focusing on image/video restoration and enhancement, generation and editing, etc.

Tianjin, China
